Room.Name: West Side of Stone Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of a stone bridge spanning the Ashton River.
Room.LongDescription: The bridge is arched high over the Ashton River below, and provides a good view of the rushing water below. The bridge is gated, and a gatekeeper's tower is on the south side of the road. It's difficult to determine what may be on the other side of the bridge because of its high arch. Must be something nice though, else why is there a gate guard?
